root.name: Super Laser Racer
root.description: OverviewThe game features 3 levels of difficulty, up to 12 unlockable ships and 12 tracks. It also has 3 game modes - survivor, endurance and regular races, as well as online leader boards for lap records on each track. There are 4 tournaments in which to unlock ships on completion. In addition to this, the game features a track editor, where users can either edit their existing tracks, or create a new one from scratch.Tournament NamesMicro, Infra, Gamma, SuperTrack NamesLazconNarpYuurotBabstarKeflaDreksuMexxinZekkeronTraztanPlazminaSattirosQattShip NamesRangerStingGeckoNeonTyRozaFedzVioKraitOctoHuttGeoPC System RequirementsOS: Windows 7/XP/VistaProcessor: 1Ghz or higherMemory: 256MB or higherHard Drive: 40MB of free spaceGraphics: OpenGL capableSound: OpenAL
